includedAssets.title: Vita Mia
includedAssets.synopsis: With Don Pietro in hiding, Ciro collaborates with Salvatore Conte to build a new drug empire.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Don Pietro in hiding, Ciro collaborates with Salvatore Conte to build a new drug empire.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Don Pietro in hiding, Ciro collaborates with Salvatore Conte to build a new drug empire.

includedAssets.title: Lacrime E Sangue
includedAssets.synopsis: Having established a new drug empire in Central America, Genny reunites with his father, Don Pietro.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Having established a new drug empire in Central America, Genny reunites with his father, Don Pietro.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Having established a new drug empire in Central America, Genny reunites with his father, Don Pietro.

includedAssets.title: Mea Culpa
includedAssets.synopsis: Conte recklessly takes revenge against one of Ciro's men, further weakening their fragile alliance.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Conte recklessly takes revenge against one of Ciro's men, further weakening their fragile alliance.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Conte recklessly takes revenge against one of Ciro's men, further weakening their fragile alliance.

includedAssets.title: Profumo Di Iena
includedAssets.synopsis: Ciro looks to cut a deal with Gennaro when new faces on the streets start causing problems. Meanwhile, Don Pietro returns to Naples.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ciro looks to cut a deal with Gennaro when new faces on the streets start causing problems. Meanwhile, Don Pietro returns to Naples.

includedAssets.title: Occhi Negli Occhi
includedAssets.synopsis: Ciro sets up a parley with Gennaro in order to avoid a full-on gang war. Gennaro agrees, but with strict orders from his father.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ciro sets up a parley with Gennaro in order to avoid a full-on gang war. Gennaro agrees, but with strict orders from his father.

includedAssets.title: 'O Track
includedAssets.synopsis: With the peace talks in tatters, a new breed of Camorrista emerges - one not concerned about breaking time-honoured traditions.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With the peace talks in tatters, a new breed of Camorrista emerges - one not concerned about breaking time-honoured traditions.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With the peace talks in tatters, a new breed of Camorrista emerges - one not concerned about breaking time-honoured traditions.

includedAssets.title: Il Principe E Il Nano
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep7 - Il Principe E Il Nano
includedAssets.synopsis: O'Principe enjoys his rise to power as the head of the new breed of Camorristi. But his celebrity and attitude soon makes him enemies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: O'Principe enjoys his rise to power as the head of the new breed of Camorristi. But his celebrity and attitude soon makes him enemies.

includedAssets.title: Divide Et Impera
includedAssets.synopsis: Following the shocking assassination, Ciro sets out to find the killer while preventing tensions from boiling over.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Following the shocking assassination, Ciro sets out to find the killer while preventing tensions from boiling over.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Following the shocking assassination, Ciro sets out to find the killer while preventing tensions from boiling over.

includedAssets.title: Sette Anni
includedAssets.synopsis: Marinella is distraught to hear that Raffaele is getting out of prison. Ciro calls a meeting to divide turf, but not everyone is happy.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Marinella is distraught to hear that Raffaele is getting out of prison. Ciro calls a meeting to divide turf, but not everyone is happy.

includedAssets.title: Fantasmi
includedAssets.synopsis: An increasingly isolated Ciro finds a possible way to sniff out Pietro's hiding place, while the Alliance call some of his decisions into question.

includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep11 - Nella Gioia E Nel Dolore
includedAssets.synopsis: Pietro prepares to take control as Ciro decides to go into hiding. Meanwhile in Rome, Avitabile suffers a business complication.

includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep12 - La Fine Del Giorno
includedAssets.synopsis: Ciro prepares for all-out war with the Savastano clan, but Pietro finds a way to get to deal his enemy a devastating blow.

includedAssets.synopsis: Ciro seeks a deal with Salvatore Conte as he attempts to build a new drug empire. Second season of the gritty Italian crime drama, based on Roberto Saviano's bestselling book.
